titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I attended the installation of the new Dean: there was a great congregation, & the service was most impressive. In the evening I lectured on "Westminster Abbey 1640-1660" to a large assembly in the fanatic Clifford's chapel at Westbourne Park.
